description_html: The asymmetrical layout of this desk features a cantilevered form. The mass of the suspended storage pedestal is countered by open space for convenient leg clearance. The perimeter reveal around the hinged desk top functions as a 360 degree wire chase. These wires then drop down through the pedestal and out the bottom at the floor. This new version of the desk incorporates a modesty panel for privacy. Offset Desks are offered in four standard sizes. Available in six different wood species in thirty one standard finishes. Custom woods, finishes and sizes are possible upon request. Companion returns, credenza's, cocktail tables and side tables are available in the Offset Collection.
